content.text: Hey, I'm good! Just working on my collection of video games.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of video games do you collect?
I mostly collect Nintendo games, but I also have some for other systems.
Nice! I have a lot of Nintendo games too. I love the Zelda series.
Me too! Zelda is my favorite series. I've been playing it since I was a kid.
Me too! I remember playing Ocarina of Time when I was little. It was my first Zelda game.
Ocarina of Time is my favorite Zelda game too! It's so good.
What other games do you like?
I also like the Mario series, Metroid, and Donkey Kong.
Those are all great games! I also like the Mario series and Metroid.
Have you played any of the new Zelda games?
Yeah, I've played Breath of the Wild and Link's Awakening. They're both great games!
I've played Breath of the Wild too. It's a really good game.
Yeah, it's one of my favorite games of all time.
Me too! It's so much fun to explore the world and find new things.
Yeah, I love exploring the world in that game. It's so big and there's so much to do.
I agree! It's one of the best open-world games ever made.
Yeah, I think so too. It's a really special game.
